town: &lt;br&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;first-character&quot;&gt;C&lt;/span&gt;edarview is located in the temperate river coast, where the vegetation is lush. Cedarview grew around a coastal harbor. They harvest cotton, and nearby is a region rich with copper ore.They are a &lt;span class=&quot;tip dotted&quot; title=&quot;The crown gives land to the nobles in exchange for military service. Peasants work, tithe, and fight for the nobles in exchange for being able to live on the noble&#39;s lands.&quot;&gt;feudalist&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&quot;tip dotted&quot; title=&quot;Governed by the elected.&quot;&gt;democratic&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&quot;tip dotted&quot; title=&quot;No formal political system exists.&quot;&gt;anarchy&lt;/span&gt;. The nearest &lt;span class=&quot;tip&quot; title=&quot;This changes each time you click.&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-link&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;landmark&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt; is &lt;span id=&quot;random&quot;&gt;a tall rock formation with two boulders at the bottom… Totally not phallic… (It is).&lt;/span&gt; A population of 116, the denizens live a destitute existence. A migration of monsters is currently taking place.&lt;br&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Government in Cedarview&lt;/h3&gt;The people of Cedarview work the land in exchange for working their lord&#39;s lands. None take responsibility for the stewardship of Cedarview, but the people hold the best semblance of order, the head of whom is Mr &lt;span class=&quot;tip&quot; id=&quot;ddecb9f1-9a6c-491e-b635-c0af1530f4bb&quot;&gt; &lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-link&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;Dannad Shadowquick&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;.&lt;br&gt;&lt;h4&gt;Economics&lt;/h4&gt;Trade is reasonable in Cedarview, and people live a destitute existence because of it; some taxes are applied to certain goods and services that are rendered in the city, but the more creative entrepenuers can find loopholes to make a better profit. Welfare is average. Citizens can find an education, provided they can pay for it. Healthcare is overtaxed and underfunded, and the government hides behind layers of bureaucracy to dodge complaints. &lt;h4&gt;Law and Order&lt;/h4&gt;The policing presence in Cedarview is more of a militia; some of the members of &lt;span class=&quot;tip&quot; id=&quot;ff313127-17ad-4ab7-8200-2eca7f6a5298&quot;&gt; &lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-link&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;The Officers of Strong Glove&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt; are part time, and there is little need for the use of force outside of intruders. Law in Cedarview is somewhat reform-based, and those that breach the laws can expect hard labor, incarceration, or fines. The death penalty is typically reserved for traitors to the state. Magic is typically reserved for those with a license. There is some magic, but is mostly for personal use, and sometimes commercial.&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Racial Demographics&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;List of Factions&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;List of NPCs&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;List of Buildings&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;List of Throwaway NPCs&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;link-internal macro-linkappend&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;h3&gt;Professions in Cedarview&lt;/h3&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;macro-linkappend-insert macro-linkappend-in&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;",
